nodes.text: Creysis's scout squadron was an Ebruchi scout squadron led by Ebruchi pirate captain Creysis. The scout group was headquartered on an unidentified moon located near the borders between Wild Space and the Unknown Regions. The scout squadron patrolled the systems near the base ship of Creysis's clan. In 2 ABY, Creysis's fleet encountered the Imperial Star Destroyer Admonitor under the command of Admiral Thrawn. Eventually, the scout squadron attacked the Admonitor and was destroyed in the ensuing battle.
Creysis's scout squadron consisted of a single Ebruchi command ship and thirty-eight Ebruchi fighters.
